channel.title: How make owners able trade
channel.description: how i make owners able trade and owners only! tell me what search for and what file it would be in thanks , im using delta based if that helps

item.title: How make owners able trade
item.dc:creator: @9mm_k0 9mm k0
item.description:
@9mm_k0 wrote:

can tell me were to add it in there??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 30, 2009, 10:06:41 am[/size][hr] if (!server.trading) {
sM(“Trading has been temporarily disabled”);
return;
}
client other = (client) handler.players[id];
if (validClient(trade_reqId)) {
if (other.inTrade) {
sM(“Other player is busy at the moment.”);
trade_reqId = 0;
return;
}
}
if(other.interfaceOpened){
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absY;
TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
sM(“Other player is busy at the moment.”);
return;
}
if(action == 1){
return;
}
if(other.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)){
sM(“Other player is busy at the moment.”);
return;
}
if(other.action == 1){
return;
}
if(other.playerRights > 2){
return;
}
if(playerRights > 2){
return;
}
if(tradeTimer != 0){
sM(“You must wait 10 minutes from the creation of your account to trade.”);
return;
}
if(other.tradeTimer != 0){
sM(“Player must wait 10 minutes from the creation of the account to trade.”);
return;
}

at what part of all that do i add it in?

Read full topic

item.title: How make owners able trade
item.dc:creator: @9mm_k0 9mm k0
item.description:
@9mm_k0 wrote:

if (!server.trading) { sM("Trading has been temporarily disabled"); return; } client other = (client) handler.players[id]; if (validClient(trade_reqId)) { if (other.inTrade) { sM("Other player is busy at the moment."); trade_reqId = 0; return; } } if(other.interfaceOpened){ int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absX; int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absY; TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY); sM("Other player is busy at the moment."); return; } if(action == 1){ return; } if(other.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)){ sM("Other player is busy at the moment."); return; } if(other.action == 1){ return; } if(other.playerRights > 2){ return; } if(playerRights > 2){ return; } if(tradeTimer != 0){ sM("You must wait 10 minutes from the creation of your account to trade."); return; } if(other.tradeTimer != 0){ sM("Player must wait 10 minutes from the creation of the account to trade."); return; }
thats all i got

public void tradereq

if(other.playerRights <= 2){ sM("They cannot trade."); return; } if(playerRights <= 2){ sM("They cannot trade."); return; }
